answers.answer: THANK YOU!  This forum has been a godsend to me and my family.  I hope each and everyone involved in this knows how many people are helped by them every day.Happy Thanksgiving to you all.Michael

As one of mnay volunteers here, thanks to Medhelp for your behind-the-scenes work and thanks to Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation for funding the research to finally cure this disease & its complications in the coming years.Until those cures are available, I am grateful that JDRF supports this forum.  It is a great "place" for us DMers to come together to learn, to share experiences, and to encouarge one another.Some days, it helps just knowing we're not waging our scary battles all alone.

question: We hope you will join Med Help International in thanking everyone at the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation - especially their volunteers who answer your questions every day. Without them, this forum would not be possible.We also thank all of our members and visitors who fill this forum with support and compassion!We hope you are all surrounded by loved ones on Thanksgiving day.Happy Thanksgiving!Cindy & PhilMed Help International
title: HAPPY THANKSGIVING!
